ðŸ“– Summary: Arch-Cleaner is a bash script designed for Arch Linux systems to automate routine maintenance and cleanup tasks. It provides features such as system updates, removal of orphaned packages, cleaning the pacman cache and journal logs, and temporary file removal, aiming to keep the system clean and optimized.
